native.n.01.definition: an indigenous person who was born in a particular place
examples: the art of the natives of the northwest coast
the Canadian government scrapped plans to tax the grants to aboriginal college students

native.a.03.definition: characteristic of or relating to people inhabiting a region from the beginning

savage.n.01.definition: a member of an uncivilized people

peasant.n.03.definition: a crude uncouth ill-bred person lacking culture or refinement

examples: fighting is crude and uncivilized especially if the weapons are efficient

berber.n.01.definition: a member of an indigenous people of northern Africa

black.n.05.definition: a person with African ancestry,  and  are archaic and pejorative today

black.a.02.definition: of or belonging to a racial group especially of sub-Saharan African origin; - Martin Luther King Jr.
examples: a great people--a black people--...injected new meaning and dignity into the veins of civilization

mumbai.n.01.definition: a city in western India just off the coast of the Arabian Sea; India's 2nd largest city (after Calcutta); has the only natural deep-water harbor in western India

myanmar.n.01.definition: a mountainous republic in southeastern Asia on the Bay of Bengal
examples: much opium is grown in Myanmar

kolkata.n.01.definition: the largest city in India and one of the largest cities in the world; located in eastern India; suffers from poverty and overcrowding

caucasian.s.02.definition: of or relating to Caucasian people

colored.s.02.definition: having skin rich in melanin pigments

coolie.n.01.definition: (ethnic slur) an offensive name for an unskilled Asian laborer

descent.n.04.definition: the kinship relation between an individual and the individual's progenitors

examples: his entire lineage has been warriors

disabled.n.01.definition: people collectively who are crippled or otherwise physically handicapped
examples: technology to help the elderly and the disabled
He was disabled in a car accident

disabled.s.01.definition: having restricted mental or physical functioning as a consequence of injury or illness

discover.v.07.definition: see for the first time; make a discovery

dwarf.n.01.definition: a person who is markedly small

eskimo.n.01.definition: a member of a people inhabiting the Arctic (northern Canada or Greenland or Alaska or eastern Siberia); the Algonquians called them Eskimo (`eaters of raw flesh') but they call themselves the Inuit (`the people')

ethnicity.n.01.definition: an ethnic quality or affiliation resulting from racial or cultural ties
examples: ethnicity has a strong influence on community status relations

alien.s.02.definition: being or from or characteristic of another place or part of the world

examples: protons, neutrons, electrons and all their exotic variants
the exotic landscape of a dead planet

footman.n.01.definition: a man employed as a servant in a large establishment (as a palace) to run errands and do chores

homosexual.n.01.definition: someone who is sexually attracted to persons of the same sex

gypsy.n.02.definition: a member of a people with dark skin and hair who speak Romany and who traditionally live by seasonal work and fortunetelling; they are believed to have originated in northern India but now are living on all continents (but mostly in Europe, North Africa, and North America)

gypsy.n.03.definition: a person who resembles a Gypsy in leading an unconventional, nomadic way of life

half-breed.n.01.definition: an offensive term for an offspring of parents of different racial group (especially of Caucasian and American Indian ancestry)

disability.n.01.definition: the condition of being unable to perform as a consequence of physical or mental unfitness

headhunter.n.02.definition: a savage who cuts off and preserves the heads of enemies as trophies

hermaphrodite.n.01.definition: one having both male and female sexual characteristics and organs; at birth an unambiguous assignment of male or female cannot be made

homosexual.a.01.definition: sexually attracted to members of your own sex

immigrant.n.01.definition: a person who comes to a country where they were not born in order to settle there

indian.a.02.definition: of or pertaining to Native Americans or their culture or languages

examples: the autochthonal fauna of Australia includes the kangaroo
autochthonous rocks and people and folktales
the Ainu are indigenous to the northernmost islands of Japan

kaffir.n.02.definition: an offensive and insulting term for any Black African

lilliputian.n.01.definition: a very small person (resembling a Lilliputian)

chennai.n.01.definition: a city in Tamil Nadu on the Bay of Bengal; formerly Madras

mestizo.n.01.definition: a person of mixed racial ancestry (especially mixed European and Native American ancestry)

muhammadan.a.01.definition: of or relating to the Arabian prophet Muhammad or to the religion he founded

mongoloid.n.01.definition: a member of the Mongoloid family

mongoloid.n.02.definition: a person suffering from Down syndrome (no longer used technically in this sense, now considered offensive)

mongoloid.a.01.definition: characteristic of or resembling a Mongol

mongoloid.a.02.definition: of or pertaining to or characteristic of one of the traditional racial division of humankind including especially peoples of central and eastern Asia

mongoloid.a.03.definition: (offensive) of or relating to or suffering from Down syndrome

moor.n.01.definition: one of the Muslim people of north Africa; of mixed Arab and Berber descent; converted to Islam in the 8th century; conqueror of Spain in the 8th century

mulatto.n.01.definition: an offspring of a black and a white parent

native.n.02.definition: a person born in a particular place or country
examples: he is a native of Brazil

native.a.01.definition: characteristic of or existing by virtue of geographic origin
examples: the native North American sugar maple

oriental.s.01.definition: denoting or characteristic of countries of the Far East

page.n.04.definition: a boy who is employed to run errands

page.n.05.definition: a youthful attendant at official functions or ceremonies such as legislative functions and weddings

primitive.n.01.definition: a person who belongs to an early stage of civilization

crude.s.04.definition: belonging to an early stage of technical development; characterized by simplicity and (often) crudeness
examples: the crude weapons and rude agricultural implements of early man
primitive living conditions in the Appalachian mountains

primitive.s.03.definition: used of preliterate or tribal or nonindustrial societies

primitive.s.04.definition: of or created by one without formal training; simple or naive in style
examples: primitive art such as that by Grandma Moses is often colorful and striking

primitivism.n.02.definition: a genre characteristic of (or imitative of) primitive artists or children

pygmy.n.02.definition: any member of various peoples having an average height of less than five feet

fagot.n.01.definition: offensive term for a homosexual man

race.n.03.definition: people who are believed to belong to the same genetic stock
examples: some biologists doubt that there are important genetic differences between races of human beings

mentally_retarded.n.01.definition: people collectively who are mentally retarded
examples: he started a school for the retarded

retarded.a.01.definition: relatively slow in mental or emotional or physical development
examples: providing a secure and sometimes happy life for the retarded

ancestor.n.01.definition: someone from whom you are descended (but usually more remote than a grandparent)

servant.n.01.definition: a person working in the service of another (especially in the household)

slave.n.01.definition: a person who is owned by someone

traditional.a.01.definition: consisting of or derived from tradition

transvestite.n.01.definition: someone who adopts the dress or manner or sexual role of the opposite sex

transvestic.a.01.definition: receiving sexual gratification from wearing clothing of the opposite sex

tribe.n.01.definition: a social division of (usually preliterate) people

kin.n.02.definition: group of people related by blood or marriage

western.a.01.definition: relating to or characteristic of the western parts of the world or the West as opposed to the eastern or oriental parts

white.a.02.definition: of or belonging to a racial group having light skin coloration
examples: voting patterns within the white population
under segregation there were even white restrooms and white drinking fountains
a lily-white movement which would expel Negroes from the organization
